## VFS.move() method

Moves/renames a file or directory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
move(sourcePath: string, targetPath: string, options?: MoveOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

sourcePath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Source path


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

targetPath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Target path


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[MoveOptions](doc/markdown/./base.moveoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Move options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example


```typescript
// Rename file
await fs.move('/old_name.txt', '/new_name.txt');

// Move file to directory
await fs.move('/file.txt', '/subdir/file.txt');

// Rename directory
await fs.move('/old_dir', '/new_dir');
```
